title: Looking to start a serious ranked 5s team | PLATINUM + [TOP, JUNGLE, ADC, SUPP] PLAYERS WANTED
body:
If you are interested in starting/being part of a team which is committed to improving and are able to play regularly (5+ days a week), please add 'Neeek', and I will try to get in contact with you as soon as possible.  My intentions for this team are for it to be relatively serious, however not to the extent where there is any toxicity or any negative feelings between members.  Thanks.  

If you would like to join, please add: Neeek

replies.body: I'm pretty keen. Plat III support. Might have an ADC that would like to play as well. Add me, Cuddly Panda.
